snippet: Sirius reported $805 million in revenue for the first three months of 2012, up 11 percent over the same period the year before. An increase in monthly subscription rates didn't appear to lose the company subscribers.
abstract: Sirius reported $805 million in revenue for the first three months of 2012, up 11 percent over the same period the year before. An increase in monthly subscription rates didn't appear to lose the company subscribers.

headline.main: Sirius XM Gains on Car Sales
